title: Which is better, aiims patna or aiims raipur? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Raipur
All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Patna

response.answer_text: Since I am a student at aiims raipur, I can say a lot about it. But yes cannot compare with the Patna aiims, as I have never gone there. During my counselling, I had even Aiims Patna in option, but I chose Aiims Raipur because people suggested me that it's a safer place than Patna. However, I can really assure you that the Academics at aiims raipur is awesome. The faculties are really dedicated. They come up with innovative ideas to rescue us from the loads of studies. The accommodation : First year mbbs students are given 3 bhk flats with 5 students sharing it, where 3 students get single rooms with one bathroom and the other two share the bigger room with attached bathroom. Facilities like hot water, 24 hr water supply are available. Even the college is slowly marching towards organizing functions for various occasions. We witness marathon, dance events, streetplays, and all sorts of cultural and sports activities.

I didn't visit aiims raipur. So i can't say about that..but i am at aiims patna now. Regarding facilities aiims Patna is good.you will get a single room here.The professors are so good as well as friendly. Also the important thing is that patient load is more in aiims patna compared to any other new aiims.And about food…i felt good. Though i am a keralite i am able to enjoy the food given here. So proudly i can say that aiims patna is good …as per my knowledge aiims Patna is better than aiims raipur
